name: Sea Plane Skill Shoot
description:
Choose your favorite aircraft from the original designs and prepare to surfing the skies at full speed! welcome to the battle planes in sky ! You are waiting for incredible battles on various battlegrounds in different climatic conditions. Visit the beautiful green meadows, the beutyful beach. You will take part in a massive battle with aircraft on extensive maps. To win, you need ingenuity and fortune, because you have to eliminate all your opponents and remain the last one standing to become a winner.
Features:
- Detailed realistic airplanes
- Never ending environment to fly and battle in!
- Challenging plane A.I.
- Realistic flying physics available
- Turbulence
- Day and night cycle
- Engine failures and immisions.
